properties.name: MakerDAO CDP
properties.tagline: Open a MakerDAO CDP to explore the world of DeFi
properties.content: MakerDAO's CDP portal allows you to easily enter the world of DeFi and open a Collateralized Debt Position with your Ether - allowing you to borrow DAI against it. Use this DAI to buy more Eth and gain a leveraged long exposure, or to cash out to USD to buy real things! Just make sure you don't get liquidated. To complete this quest, open a MakerDAO CDP at https://cdp.makerdao.com/

properties.name: Compound Lending
properties.content: Compound enables you to easily borrow and lend Ethereum-based cryptocurrencies in a trustless manner, without risk of non-repayment. To complete this quest, lend some crypto via the Compound.Finance platform! https: //app.compound.finance/

properties.name: Decentraland LAND Grab
properties.content: Decentraland is a virtual world where you can build and explore 3D creations, play games and socialize. The decentraland experiences are currently being built by thousands of LAND owners. Once they are ready, you will be able to explore the world on your computer, phone or VR headset.The Decentraland Marketplace is a fully decentralized and open market where you can discover, buy, sell, and manage your parcels of LAND. To complete this quest, buy some LAND at https://market.decentraland.org/

properties.name: Gods Unchained
properties.tagline: Collect unique digital trading cards and battle with opponents!
properties.content: Gods Unchained is a platform similar to Hearthstone, with a unique twist - the cards you obtain are yours. Forever. Nobody can take them away from you, and they will persist even if the Gods Unchained platform for some reason is no longer maintained. Not only this, but the cards can be interacted with via other services due to the composability of Ethereum! Imagine being able to use your unique digital Gods Unchained trading cards inside of a virtual reality MMO - the possibilities are endless. To complete this quest, purchase your first Gods Unchained pack at https://godsunchained.com

metadata.completionCriteria: 1. User buys Gods Unchained pack / obtains a Gods Unchained card

properties.name: Helena Prediction Markets
properties.tagline: Vote on your predictions for the future and earn rewards!
properties.content: Helena employs gamified prediction markets to deliver real-time signals covering future events and milestones. Helena prediction markets cover a variety of topics ranging from crypto to politics, sports, movies, technology and others. To complete this quest, head over to https://helena.network/ and participate in your first market!

metadata.completionCriteria: 1. User votes on a prediction market in Helena

properties.name: Augur Prediction Markets
properties.tagline: Bet on the outcome of custom events in real-time!
properties.content: Augur is a non-custodial betting platform which allows you to bet on, or create a bet for, any arbitrary event! Through this, the wisdom of the crowds is sourced to best predict the future outcome of events. This mechanism can also act as an oracle for Ethereum, providing insight into activites happening in the real world - and their resolutions. Coupled with other smart contracts, for example an insurance smart contract, the Ethereum blockchain can learn things about the real world and execute when certain real-world conditions are met! To complete this quest, go to https://www.augur.net/ and place your first bet.

metadata.completionCriteria: 1. User votes on a prediction market in Augur.

properties.name: Cryptokitties
properties.tagline: Obtain, breed, and trade unique digital collectibles!
properties.content: CryptoKitties is a game centered around breedable, collectible, and oh-so-adorable creatures we call CryptoKitties! Each cat is one-of-a-kind and 100% owned by you; it cannot be replicated, taken away, or destroyed. To complete this quest, obtain your first CryptoKitty at https://www.cryptokitties.co/

properties.name: Gitcoin Kudos
properties.tagline: Show your appreciation for someone by giving them a Gitcoin Kudos!
properties.content: Kudos is a way of showing your appreciation for another Gitcoin member via a unique ERC-721 token. It's also a way to showcase special skills that a member might have, such as Pythonista, or Design Star. Kudos tokens can be bought and sold on the Kudos Marketplace. Send your first Kudos at https://gitcoin.co/kudos/ to complete this quest!

properties.name: Gitcoin Bounties
properties.tagline: Grow the open-source ecosystem by bountying a piece of work!
properties.content: Gitcoin's core product offering is a platform which enables developers to get paid for contributing to software development projects. Builders/Project managers can post and bounty issues, leveraging a global, on-demand workforce. Freelance developers can easily find places to contribute, and get rewarded for their work. To complete this quest, fund an issue on Gitcoin at https://gitcoin.co/

metadata.completionCriteria: 1. User submits a Gitcoin Bounty (sends crypto to the bounty contract).

properties.name: Gitcoin Grants
properties.tagline: Provide sustainable funding for Open Source with Gitcoin Grants
properties.content: Gitcoin Grants, powered by the EIP 1337 standard , are a fast, easy and secure way to provide recurring token contributions to your favorite OSS maintainers. To complete this quest, show your support by visiting https://gitcoin.co/grants/ and contribute to a grant!

metadata.completionCriteria: 1. User contributes to a Gitcoin Grant

properties.name: Bounties Network Bounties
properties.tagline: Create a bounty on the Bounties Network
properties.content: The Bounties Network empowers humans to incentivize and self-organize, from freelancing to grassroots social action, and anything in between. Whether it's for research, content translation, or video production, The Bounties Network lets you create projects, collaborate, and get paid for doing great work in any domain. To complete this quest, create a bounty on https://bounties.network/.

metadata.completionCriteria: 1. User creates bounty on the bounties network (sends crypto to the bounties contract).

properties.name: Gitcoin Quests
properties.tagline: Battle enemies with your knowledge in a fast-paced area to earn Kudos
properties.content: Gitcoin Quests is a fun, gamified way to learn about the web3 ecosystem, compete with your friends, earn rewards, and level up your decentralization-fu! Pitch your Ethereum Killer to the VC-Bro at https://gitcoin.co/quests/ to complete this quest!

metadata.completionCriteria: 1. User receives the Kudos from the Pitch your Ethereum Killer to the VC-Bro quest

properties.name: ENS
properties.tagline: Get started with the Ethereum Name Service
properties.summary: ENS offers a secure & decentralised way to address resources both on and off the blockchain using simple, human-readable names. To complete this quest, grab a human readable name, and have it resolve to your Eth address!

metadata.completionCriteria: 1. User registers and ENS address; 2. User sets a resolver for that ENS address
